alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...NEAR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS SUNDAY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... Dry conditions and breezy winds will lead to near critical fire weather conditions Sunday across the Iron Range through the Twin Ports and west through Leech Lake and Lake Winnibigoshish. West to northwest winds of 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 25 mph are forecast for Sunday afternoon and evening. Minimum relative humidity values of 20 to 25 percent are also expected. Together, these conditions could lead to the rapid spread of fires. Check burning restrictions and the fire danger before burning. For more information on burning restrictions for Minnesota, see www.dnr.state.mn.us/forestry/fire/firerating_restrictions.html.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Itasca
